item.title: Skills
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Okay, how do I make a single skill 120, just one. [code=JAVA] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;
if (exp > 509934430 && exp < 1009934430 && deathCape == 0 || deathCape == 2 && exp > 1509934430 || deathCape == 1 && exp > 1009934430 && exp < 1509934430)
return 99;
for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0
* Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
if (output >= exp) {
return lvl;
}

	}
	return 99;
}[/code]It's very simple what I'm trying to do, but my head hurts, and it's confusing me.

Read full topic
